documents.document: Excited to be able to start another season. I took playing for granted for a long time but finally appreciate it and want to keep going 💪🏻
RT @DrTaraM: Kimmel, Kaepernick .... entertainers have always been told to know their place and not "act out". https://t.co/nqwcJciwsD
@McCarthyMick It gives players the perfect opportunity to respond to him directly. Big moment coming 🤞🏻
Sunday's #NFL national anthems are going to be fascinating. The perfect opportunity for peaceful protest by players. Will many do it? https://t.co/46YH82e0PK
@BobbyMarks42 So does he end up losing more by having to pay both?
I'd like to cosine this opinion.... https://t.co/fcfsjPLZNy
RT @SportforBusines: New three year deal for TV and online broadcast between @BballIrl and @SportTG4 Happy days and nights. https://t.co/YM…
Great news for the sport and for the future of the Cup. https://t.co/1vs2I5l8No
Very sad news. He was the voice of the Olympics for me growing up. The iconic 2012 Katie Taylor moment will always be tied to him. RIP https://t.co/TjbcpMKibs
@robscott33 Can't miss out on a snazzy coaching hat either 👀 https://t.co/BIJ4NSN1wh
@steveohrourke London on these dates? 🤔 https://t.co/AGPHoenxwt
@Cbarron15 @AskKBCIreland @Cloud90HQ We had a call centre abroad. Unfortunately social was only 1 part of the agents work over there so often slipped. Improved over time though
@Cbarron15 In the industries I worked previously we achieved average <60 mins. We struggled overnight due to reliance on external call centres 10pm-7am
@Cbarron15 Think the time frame is dependent on the service/product. Airline/phone etc <60mins, more traditional ones I'm ok with <6 hours.
@bhealy_ireland Great read. Amazing the impact geography has without us ever really considering it.
@BlountJordan13 @FIBA Yeah would be great. Euroleague teams can't play league mode though just exhibition games.
@BlountJordan13 @FIBA Nba live had the national teams for a while and was good. There should be euroleague mode in 2k
@technerdian @WhyNotMeHoops @PatLyons15 https://t.co/mHn3DiHO5q I paid €6.99 for one month of it.
Absolutely loved watching Dragic and Slovenia during #eurobasket. Deserving winners after a brilliant run.
@WhyNotMeHoops @PatLyons15 The flow of the game is much better.
Looks brilliant. Well done @stpaulsbc. Kerry are certainly setting a new standard for crowds. https://t.co/gEdg9GWUjr
@IndoSport @eannabasketball Interesting stuff. @Mike_Quirke is it possible for teams to switch defenses or is it too difficult. Zone after a free etc.
Slovenia 😍 #eurobasket! I don't like that they have Randolph but that backcourt is 💯
